work.name: Brown University
work.summary: Work on mathematics formalization under Robert Lewis. Current project on the Fibonacci Sequence, which is a functor on the category of natural numbers with divisibility. The 'Fibonacci Entry Sequence', defined for each natural number *n* to be the smallest number *k* such that *n* divides *F(k)*, is also a functor on this category, and is in fact the left adjoint of the Fibonacci Functor. My work involves formalizing the necessary theorems to show this adjunction, and extending it to the more general class of *strong divisibility sequences*.

projects.name: Fib-Functor
projects.summary: The divisbility relation on the natural numbers is an example of a category, an abstract mathematical structure. The fibonacci sequence on this category is an example of a functor, a map preserving the structure of a category. This project is on the formalization of this fact, as well as related properties of the fibonacci functor, in Lean4, an interactive theorem prover.
